title: Pressing Enter always edits first item instead of selected
description:
## Summary
When using the beads UI component (string/beads picker), selecting a bead and pressing Enter to edit it incorrectly opens the edit dialog for the **first item** in the list instead of the **currently selected bead**.

## Expected Behavior
Pressing Enter while a bead is selected should open the edit dialog for that specific selected bead.

## Actual Behavior
Pressing Enter always targets the first item in the beads list, regardless of which bead is currently selected.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Open a beads component with multiple beads/items
2. Click on a bead that is NOT the first item to select it (verify visual selection indicator)
3. Press Enter to edit
4. Observe that the edit dialog opens for the first bead, not the selected one

## Impact
This makes the keyboard navigation unusable - users cannot edit any beads except the first one via keyboard.

## Environment
- Component: beads UI picker/string component
close_reason: Fixed: onSelect now captures selectedId from selectList.getSelectedItem() before calling done()
